extendedInfo.description: Hungry? Need a reservation in Singapore tonight? With the Chope Restaurant Reservations app, you can make free reservations with instant confirmation at over 200 restaurants in Singapore.Features- Android 4.1 compatible!- Make free reservations with instant confirmation.- Use âMy Bookingsâ to view past bookings and edit or cancel upcoming bookings.- View easy-to-read restaurant profiles, which include maps, hours, cuisine, reviews, and photos.- Discover great restaurants by browsing cuisine and location categories.- If youâre looking for a restaurant in your location, use the âNearbyâ function to find a restaurant in your area.- If you already know your restaurant, the âA-Zâ list will help you find it easily. FeedbackAre there any features you'd like to see in future versions of this app? Email support@chope.com.sg with any app issues or other feedback!

reviews.title: Great idea!
reviews.comment: Will be more awesome if uve a dedicated Halal tab. If u do, confirm 110% that this app will be the next big thing.  Also improve on the gui. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Well designed, easy to use, lots of restaurants, instant confirmations. What more could you want?
reviews.author: Chau Sean Koh

reviews.title: Keeps logging me out
reviews.comment: I like the app.. when it was working that is. Was trying to retrieve my bookings but error msg shows my session has expired. Signed in again.. same error msg. Sone that for 3 times.. still the same. The app is supposed to enable, not cripple. :(
reviews.author: Wency Chay

reviews.title: Closed results
reviews.comment: I\'m staying in Serangoon near NEX Mall. I searched buffet and the result returned none. I think this app is only limited to advertisers. In fact, there are lots of buffet restaurants in NEX. Yet they claimed to be best food app. The app may be best but not the results.
reviews.author: Eric Goh

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Need some tuning on the GUI on S4 as some of the tabs are covered ... a bit buggy in booking time but overall awesome !
reviews.author: Chen Yongquan

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Very convenient app to make restaurant reservations! And to find new places to eat at. No more troublesome and time wasting bookings through calling!
reviews.author: Edmund Leow

reviews.title: Finally!
reviews.comment: Finally I don\'t have to put up with waiting on the phone forever to make a reservation or be unable to snag a seat even if the restaurant is closed. About time we finally have this in food crazy Singapore.   Love the instant rewards too!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Error - Incompatible Update
reviews.comment: I am unable to install this app to my Samsung Galaxy Note II ( after several tries ) as it keeps saying Error - Incompatible Update
reviews.author: Fook-Mun Woo

reviews.title: Love the location feature!
reviews.comment: Works everytime, and is a gem to have. And the pretty pictures are an awesome bonus.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: New app, but uses old interface
reviews.comment: Good effort, but the gingerbread interface destroys it\'s look. Why use those orange gingerbread textboxes and scrollers when the Holo theme is easily available in the sdk
reviews.author: Sim Kern Cheh

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: So easy now to find the best places in Singapore.....
reviews.author: A Google User
